items.title: A Haunting Collection of Twisty, Turny Micro Stories
items.description: This collection of 52 short and micro stories is a haunting indictment of misogyny in popular culture and society.

items.title: Fun Spins on the Classic Creatures You Think You Know
items.description: These stories put an exciting new spin on the creatures we all think we know, from vampires and zombies to sirens.

items.title: Reading While Neurodivergent: A Librarian’s Guide to Loving Books on Your Own Terms
items.description: The model we call “good reading” is neurotypical reading. It assumes a brain that can sustain focus in long, quiet stretches.

items.title: Shiver With Anticcccc-ipation: Rocky Horror at 50
items.description: Rocky Horror is turning 50, and we're celebrating with a list of must-read books for fans of the cult classic.
